title: Lenis & Clear Face Cleanser - Gentle Hydrating Cleanser for All Skin Types
description: Our Lenis & Clear Face Cleanser is a carefully formulated skincare product designed to gently cleanse your skin, remove dirt, and maintain hydration. It helps prevent breakouts, reduces wrinkles, and fights signs of aging, leaving your skin feeling fresh, smooth, and rejuvenated. Perfect for daily use, this 100ml cleanser is suitable for all skin types.
how_to_use: Wet your face with lukewarm water.
Apply a small amount of Lenis & Clear Face Cleanser to your fingertips.
Gently massage the cleanser onto your face in circular motions, avoiding the eye area.
Rinse thoroughly with water and pat your skin dry with a clean towel.
Use daily in the morning and evening for best results.

title: Elegance Moisturizing Body Scrub
description: Enriched with organic minerals, this luxurious body scrub deeply cleanses the skin, unclogs pores, and enhances skin texture. It leaves your skin soft, smooth, brighter, and naturally glowing.
how_to_use: Wet your entire body with warm water.
Gently massage the scrub onto your skin in circular motions.
Allow the scrub to sit for at least 7 minutes to maximize its effectiveness.
Rinse off thoroughly with warm water.
Use once or twice a week for a visibly radiant and refreshed look.
seo: best body scrub for dry skin

title: 2+1 Moisturizing & Lightning Body Wash
description: A nourishing body wash that deeply moisturizes while gently lightening the skin. It cleanses, smoothens, softens, and repairs dry, cracked skin, leaving it radiant and refreshed.
how_to_use: Use morning and night for quicker and more effective results.
Apply a small amount to wet skin.
Gently massage into the skin in circular motions.
Rinse thoroughly with warm water.
seo: best body wash for cracked skin

title: Restoration Body Oil
description: Enriched with rose hip, lemon, and jojoba oils. This body oil reduces the appearance of dark spots, curbs obvious stretch marks, eradicates flaky skin, improves overall texture and appearance of the skin, evens out skin tone, and boosts skin glow.
how_to_use: Apply a small amount of the oil to your skin.
Gently massage in circular motions until fully absorbed.
Can be used 2 or more times per day for best results.
key_features: Improves skin texture and reduces fine lines

title: Lenis and Clear Face Soap
description: This beautiful goat milk-infused face bar soap is designed to keep the skin moisturized for 24 hours. It prevents dryness, redness, and skin inflammation while promoting a healthy, glowing complexion.
how_to_use: Wet your face with warm water.
Gently massage the soap onto your skin in circular motions.
Rinse thoroughly with warm water.
Use every day (morning and night) for more visible results.

title: Rose Glow Oil
description: Suitable for dark skin persons that wish to achieve a more refined brown skin tone. It maintains the skin's original texture, fades pigmentation, and keeps the skin moisturized all day.
how_to_use: Apply a small amount of the oil to your skin.
Gently massage in circular motions until fully absorbed.
Use every day for a quality result.
key_features: Keeps the skin moisturized all day

title: Lightnizer Xtra Lightning Body Oil
description: This silky lightning body oil is designed to keep the skin looking visibly light and clear. It deeply nourishes the skin, keeps it smooth and silky, and fights aging and wrinkles.

title: Molato Soap
description: Enriched with Kojic acid, mulberry, papaya extract, and other lightning agents that effectively brighten/lighten the skin, fade away dark spots, and remove dead skin cells.
how_to_use: Rub the soap all over the skin.
Leave it to settle for about 10-15 minutes.
Wash it off thoroughly.
Use twice daily for best results.

title: Xwhite Face Cleanser and Xwhite Glow Face Cream Combo
description: This combo effectively lightens dark spots, fades hyper-pigmentation, and evens out skin tone. Formulated with scientifically backed ingredients, it provides visible results in a short period. Infused with natural ingredients, it gently nourishes, clears dark spots, and lightens the skin, leaving it silky and smooth.
how_to_use: Use the Xwhite Face Cleanser to wash your face, gently massaging in circular motions.
Rinse thoroughly with water.
Apply the Xwhite Glow Face Cream to your face and neck, gently massaging until fully absorbed.
Use morning and night for best results.

title: Itching Solution
description: It's mostly recommended for people that deal with water or environmental skin conditions. It helps treat bathing water and makes it safer to use without any issues.
how_to_use: Add just a teaspoon of the solution inside bathing water.
Bathe as usual.
Apply your oil or body moisturizer immediately after the bath.

title: Caramel Black Soap
description: Prevents rashes, eczema, itching, and scaly skin. Removes blemishes, relieves acne, maintains the skin's original color and texture, cleanses pores, and rejuvenates the skin, leaving it smooth, fresh, and clean.
how_to_use: Use morning and night.
Apply Rose Glow Body Oil for a more natural brown-looking appearance.

title: Glam Glow Face Cream - Collagen & Niacinamide Infused Skin Food for Glow & Hydration
description: Our Glam Glow Face Cream is a luxurious skin food infused with hydrolyzed collagen and niacinamide. Designed to deliver a radiant glow, this cream brightens, hydrates, and protects your skin while smoothing and rejuvenating it. Perfect for individuals with brown and bright skin tones, this 20g cream is your go-to solution for a healthy, glowing complexion.
skin_type: Best for brown and bright skin tones
how_to_use: Cleanse your face thoroughly.
Take a small amount of Glam Glow Face Cream and apply it evenly to your face and neck.
Gently massage in upward circular motions until fully absorbed.
Use daily in the morning and evening for best results.
